医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
革命性的四生物标志物组合为早期卵巢癌检测带来了希望用于早期检测卵巢癌的生物标志物 CA125。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-four-biomarker-panel-offers-hope-for-early-ovarian-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-four-biomarker-panel-offers-hope-for-early-ovarian-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97d6cd6b-325e-4b17-806e-7cd2cdd79de5 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:31:00 -0500 Revolutionary four-biomarker panel offers hope for early ovarian cancer detection
在抑制青少年爱吃甜食方面，管理情绪比提升幸福感更有效吗？最近的一项研究探讨了情绪驱动的冲动或社会心理健康是否对健康或不健康的食物选择有更大的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Is-managing-emotions-more-efficient-than-boosting-wellbeing-in-curbing-teens-sweet-tooth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Is-managing-emotions-more-efficient-than-boosting-wellbeing-in-curbing-teens-sweet-tooth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcc75b4f-e4b9-4a26-98cb-ded855441210 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:23:00 -0500 Is managing emotions more effective than boosting wellbeing in curbing teens' sweet tooth?
2023 年，非吸烟者肺癌位居全球癌症相关死亡前五位从未吸烟的人患肺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Non-smokers-lung-cancer-among-top- Five-global-cancer-lated-deaths-in-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Non-smokers-lung-cancer-among-top- Five-global-cancer-lated-deaths-in-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aeee2fb8-a68c-4779-a541-0f00f18ff24d Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:04:00 -0500 Non-smokers' lung cancer among top five global cancer-related deaths in 2023
纽瑟姆重新审视 25 美元最低医疗工资，微妙的劳工行业协议不断变化加州州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 在批准该措施不到三个月后，正在重新考虑加州逐步实施全国领先的 25 美元卫生工作者最低工资的举措，因为预计赤字将达到 380 亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delicate-labor-industry-deal-in-flux-as-Newsom-revisits-2425-minimum-health-wage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delicate-labor-industry-deal-in-flux-as-Newsom-revisits-2425-minimum-health-wage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31a18b20-0c84-4c78-a8d4-9b99a4210c15 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 06:00:58 -0500 Delicate labor-industry deal in flux as Newsom revisits $25 minimum health wage
州合同的延误使蒙大拿州的医疗服务提供者陷入困境蒙大拿州卫生组织表示，州政府积压向承包商支付费用，这阻碍了他们提供医疗服务的能力，他们担心在资金到位后很长一段时间内，瓶颈的连锁反应仍将显现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delays-in-state-contracts-leave-Montana-health-providers-strapped.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Delays-in-state-contracts-leave-Montana-health-providers-strapped.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d95c9f5d-78e6-4f09-85fc-3c08f490a991 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 05:59:35 -0500 Delays in state contracts leave Montana health providers strapped
每 12 人中就有 1 人罹患胃肠道癌症，每 16 人中就有 1 人死于胃肠道癌症研究人员估计了胃肠癌的终生风险和相关死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Risk-of-cancers-translates-to-one-in-12-people-developmenting-and-one-in-16-people-dying-来自胃肠道癌症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Risk-of-cancers-translates-to-one-in-12-people-developmenting-and-one-in-16-people-dying-来自-胃肠道-癌症.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fedaf97b-403a-440c-a615-36d119aeecbd Thu, 11 Jan 2024 05:58:00 -0500 Risk of gastrointestinal cancers translates to one in 12 people developing, and one in 16 people dying from, gastrointestinal cancers
揭示隐藏的潜力：用于神经科学研究疾病建模的类器官在我们最新的采访中，News-Medical 采访了 ACROBiosystems 的 Rosanna 张，讨论了如何利用类器官进行神经科学研究领域的疾病建模。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unveiling-Hidden-Potential-Organoids-for-Disease-Modeling-in-Neuroscience-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unveiling-Hidden-Potential-Organoids-for-Disease-Modeling-in-Neuroscience-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c72ebc9-7424-4488-b5e7-3906d86ef898 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 04:44:00 -0500 Unveiling Hidden Potential: Organoids for Disease Modeling in Neuroscience Research
FluidForm Bio 通过 FRESH™ 3D 生物打印成功展示了工程心脏组织的进步FluidForm Bio 是开发仿生人体组织来治疗疾病的领导者，分享了使用 FRESH™ 3D 生物打印构建人体心脏组织的最新进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/FluidForm-Bio-successively-demonstrates-advancements-in-engineered-heart-tissues-with-FRESHe284a2-3D-bioprinting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/FluidForm-Bio-successively-demonstrates-advancements-in-engineered-heart-tissues-with-FRESHe284a2-3D-bioprinting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2526178-1f88-46b1-b770-c661ac9a7a05 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 04:01:00 -0500 FluidForm Bio successfully demonstrates advancements in engineered heart tissues with FRESH™ 3D bioprinting
阿尔茨海默病被发现有五种不同的亚型研究人员利用蛋白质组测序确定了阿尔茨海默病的五种不同的分子亚型，并提出了基于每种亚型独特的遗传和病理特征的个性化治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Alzheimers-disease-found-to-have- Five-distinct-subtypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Alzheimers-disease-found-to-have- Five-distinct-subtypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6b04a8a-da8e-4020-98d9-79d135c981c2 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 23:31:00 -0500 Alzheimer's disease found to have five distinct subtypes
研究揭示了 COVID-19 对大脑功能和结构的持久影响研究调查了 COVID-19 后的认知缺陷，发现 SARS-CoV-2 感染与脑损伤标志物和扣带皮层体积减少有关，而皮质类固醇可提供一定的认知保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Research-reveals-COVID-19s- permanent-impact-on-brain-function-and-struct.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Research-reveals-COVID-19s- permanent-impact-on-brain-function-and-struct.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbda5973-716c-48d3-a640-6fd7cc78c5fe Wed, 10 Jan 2024 23:09:00 -0500 Research reveals COVID-19's lasting impact on brain function and structure
